allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Pakistan Taxpayer Directory 2018 extraction tools

- Fast PDF extraction using pdftotext + perl pipeline
- SQLite database creation with indexes
- Query interface for searching taxpayers
- GitHub Pages with interactive data visualization
- Extracted 108,946 companies and 2,738,407 individuals

Data source: https://opendata.com.pk/dataset/tax-directory-of-pakistan-2018

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
